titles.title: Security Assistance Act of 2008
Global Pathogen Surveillance Act of 2008
Naval Vessel Transfer Act of 2008
Nuclear Safeguards and Supply Act of 2008
Security Assistance Act of 2008
Global Pathogen Surveillance Act of 2008
Naval Vessel Transfer Act of 2008
Nuclear Safeguards and Supply Act of 2008
An original bill to authorize appropriations under the Arms Export Control Act and the Foreign Assistance Act of 1961 for security assistance for fiscal years 2009 and 2010, and for other purposes.

action.text: Committee on Foreign Relations. Original measure reported to Senate by Senator Dodd. With written report No. 110-496.

calendar.text: Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under General Orders. Calendar No. 1074.
